attributes.description: Monitor Windows registry Run keys and startup locations for persistence mechanisms, excluding known Microsoft entries
attributes.query:
SELECT 
  path, 
  name, 
  data, 
  type 
FROM registry 
WHERE (
    path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%' 
    OR path LIKE 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%' 
    OR path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\Software\\WOW6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%'
  ) 
  AND name != '' 
  AND data NOT LIKE '%\\Windows\\System32\\%' 
  AND data NOT LIKE '%\\Program Files\\Windows%' 
ORDER BY path 
LIMIT 100;
